content:
Sure! Here is the updated marking rubric in a grid model:

| Criteria | Excellent (4) | Very Good (3) | Good (2) | Poor (1) |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| Commentary on Intended Use of Test | The critique demonstrates a sophisticated and thorough understanding of the intended use of the test in the assessment of Nick. The critique provides a clear and insightful analysis of the likely referral question for which the test is likely to be used as a tool. | The critique demonstrates a good understanding of the intended use of the test in the assessment of Nick. The critique provides a clear analysis of the likely referral question for which the test is likely to be used as a tool. | The critique provides a basic understanding of the |  |
